rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses the neutral verb 'were' and contains no high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain any loaded rhetorical questions.
The segment reports the location of latest cases factually without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser word combined with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain any bare negation.
